programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Swashbuckling historical adventure sequel starring François Civil, Vincent Cassel and Eva Green. After his love Constance is kidnapped, young musketeer D'Artagnan sets out to rescue her, aided by the mysterious spy Milady de Winter, who's recently broken out of prison. Meanwhile, Porthos, Aramis and Athos are on their own mission.. programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. His flashes of memory loss at work soon cause trouble, but redemption beckons when he attempts to reconnect with his estranged daughter and grandson Hans Petter Moland - Director Liam Neeson - Thug Yolonda Ross - Woman Frankie Shaw - Daisy Daniel Diemer - Kyle Conner Javier Molina - Gamberro Ron Perlman - Charlie Conner Jimmy Gonzales - Diego Machado Terrence Pulliam - Dre.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husband's work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Futuristic action epic starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Chris Hemsworth. As a child, Furiosa is kidnapped from the "Green Place" by wasteland marauders ruled by the despotic Dementus, who murders her mother. Growing up to find herself caught in the crossfire between two rival warlords, Furiosa devises a plan to escape and to take revenge on Dementus George Miller (2) - Director Anya Taylor-Joy - Furiosa Chris Hemsworth - Dementus Tom Burke - Praetorian Jack Alyla Browne - Young Furiosa George Shevtsov - The History Man Lachy Hulme - Immortan Joe / Rizzdale Pell John Howard - The People Eater Angus Sampson - Organic Mechanic Charlee Fraser - Mary Jabassa Elsa Pataky - Vuvalini General / Mr Norton Nathan Jones - Rictus Erectus Josh Helman - Scrotus.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Family, Children's, Mystery ║ 2016 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Mark Rylance and Ruby Barnhill. London, 1983: ten-year-old Sophie is awake in the middle of the night when she spots a giant from the window of her orphanage home. Although Sophie hides, the 24ft behemoth grabs her and takes the little girl to Giant Country. programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. At the funeral for an old friend, Claire approaches the deceased's widower and states that she intends to murder him in revenge for something terrible he did decades ago. programme.title: Skincare

She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. Director Austin Peters' thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks and Lewis Pullman Austin Peters - Director Elizabeth Banks (2) - Hope Goldman Lewis Pullman - Jordan Luis Gerardo Mendez - Angel Vergara Michaela Jaé Rodriguez - Marine Nathan Fillion - Brett Wright.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Drama starring Eddie Peng. After spending time in prison for manslaughter, taciturn former stunt rider and musician Lang returns to his home town in remote north west China. He joins a local team rounding up stray dogs in preparation for the 2008 Olympics. One mutt proves particularly problematic, but Lang slowly begins to strike up a bond with the animal Guan Hu - Director Eddie Peng - Lang Liya Tong - Grape Jia Zhangke - Uncle Yao.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.sub-title: Horror, Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. programme.desc: Matt Damon plays a man with amnesia who finds himself at the centre of a manhunt. First-rate action thriller. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2002)(114 mins).

programme.desc: Matt Damon returns as the amnesiac assassin, forced to abandon his quiet new life when he's framed for murder. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2004)(105 mins).

programme.desc: Amnesiac ex-assassin Jason Bourne tracks down the spooks responsible for turning him into a killer. (2007)(111 mins).

programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. programme.title: PL 100 Club: Wayne Rooney

programme.title: PL Greatest: Leeds/Liverpool 2000

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City v QPR '12

programme.title: PL Greatest:C Palace/L'Pool 2014

programme.title: PL Greatest : Man U/Man City 2009

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Warrington Wolves and Hull KR clash in the Betfred Super League. Warrington inflicted a ninth defeat this season upon the Black and Whites' rivals Hull FC last week. (09.05).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the Betfred Women's Super League, as St Helens and Leeds Rhinos clash at the Totally Wicked Stadium. After three played, it's Leeds Rhinos who boast the perfect record. (24.05).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Atlanta Falcons host the reigning Super Bowl champions Kansas City Chiefs during week three of the 2024 NFL season. (22.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights

programme.title: LIVE: S/Lge: Warrington v Leeds
programme.desc: Warrington Wolves play host to Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League.

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: Magic Weekend and round 22 of the 2024 Betfred Super League campaign concludes, as Huddersfield Giants and Castleford Tigers wrap proceedings up at Elland Road. (18.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: In a huge game at the top of the table, fourth-placed St Helens host a table-topping Hull KR in the Betfred Super League. Willie Peters' side are now six games undefeated. (24.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: A Grand Final rematch, as Catalans Dragons take on second-placed Wigan in the Betfred Super League. An inconsistent Catalans sit in sixth place with Leigh and Leeds close by. (31.08).

programme.desc: Real-time, breaking National Football League news covering all 32 teams as it happens with the most connected sources in the sport.

programme.desc: Warrington Wolves play host to Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League.

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Leeds Rhinos clash with Steve McNamara's Catalans Dragons, whose 0-34 victory over London Broncos last week produced four different try-scorers (02.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Unbeaten at home, Catalans Dragons host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. Third-placed Warrington take back-to-back league wins to the south of France. (25.05).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: St Helens host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Saints were in rampant mood during round 11's clash with Castleford, pulling off an incredible 4-60 victory. (24.05).

programme.title: S/Lge 24 Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the Betfred Women's Super League, as St Helens and Leeds Rhinos clash at the Totally Wicked Stadium. After three played, it's Leeds Rhinos who boast the perfect record. (24.05).

programme.desc: The Sharks and the Bulldogs meet during round five of the 2025 NRL season.

programme.desc: Former Bradford Bulls and St Helens star Leon Pryce discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Mayer v Ryan
programme.desc: After a four-fight run on British soil, Mikaela Mayer returns to the US looking to become a two-weight world champion as she faces Sandy Ryan for the WBO welterweight world title. (28.09).

programme.title: S/Lge
programme.desc: Third meets fourth as Warrington Wolves host St Helens in the Betfred Super League. The Saints arrive with winning momentum behind them after defeating Huddersfield in round 24. (07.09).

programme.title: S/Lge
programme.desc: The top two of the Betfred Super League clash during round 25 of the 2024 season, as Wigan Warriors play host to Hull KR in the race for the League Leaders' Shield. (06.09).

programme.title: S/Lge
programme.desc: A clash from the 2024 Betfred Super League as Huddersfield Giants face Warrington Wolves. The visitors sit close behind Hull KR in the table and could still finish second. (14.09).

programme.title: S/Lge
programme.desc: A clash between Leigh Leopards and St Helens during the final round of the Betfred Super League, as sixth takes on fifth. Leigh are looking to leapfrog the Saints in the table. (20.09).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby

programme.title: Fight Night
programme.desc: Putting her IBF world welterweight championship on the line, Natasha Jonas steps inside the ring with former unified world champion Mikaela Mayer at the M&S Bank Arena in Liverpool. (20.01).

programme.title: S/Lge
programme.desc: Out to retain the League Leaders' Shield, Wigan host Salford for the final regular round of the Super League. 80 minutes stand between the Warriors and another Old Trafford outing. (17.09).

programme.title: S/Lge
programme.desc: Hull KR play host to Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. Two tries from Ash Handley got Leeds over the line in their opener, while the Robins stormed to victory over Hull FC. (22.02).

programme.desc: After a four-fight run on British soil, Mikaela Mayer returns to the US looking to become a two-weight world champion as she faces Sandy Ryan for the WBO welterweight world title. (28.09).
